name: Slayer of Dungeons
description:
Slayer of Dungeons

Description

Dungeon Crawler , Monster slaying arcade game

The goal is simple slay as many monsters as you can to earn points. You are stepping in the shoes of a Chivalrous Knight who has made his life's goal to clean the Dungeons of monsters for the Glory of his Kingdom.

Credits 

Sound Clips and Music => Soundimage.org

Sprites => HeroKnight (Sven Thole) , Bandits (Sven Thole) , Medieval Pixel Art (Blackspire)

Coding and Game Design => Done Myself . 

This game is submitted for the LMOB Game Jam.
